ppy/helm-charts.summary: The ppy/helm-charts repository has seen recent activity with multiple push events, including updates to the index.yaml file, enhancements to storage RWX documentation, addition of probes configuration, and upgrades to the osu-beatmap-difficulty-lookup-cache subchart. Furthermore, there have been improvements to osu-web chart and updates to container ports.

ppy/osu.summary: The ppy/osu repository has experienced significant activity with push and pull request events, including the implementation of the ability to mark beatmaps as played, enabling seasonal features, and addressing community-reported issues. These updates aim to improve user experience and functionality within the osu platform.

ppy/osu-web.summary: The ppy/osu-web repository has undergone substantial updates with a recent push event, incorporating various features and fixes such as accounting for retina size team flags, adding submission-relevant events to the database, requiring multiplayer API to join rooms, and introducing a leave team button. These changes enhance the overall functionality and user interaction with osu-web.

ppy/osu-framework.summary: The ppy/osu-framework repository has seen a pull request event aimed at adding support for locking screen orientation on iOS, a feature intended for use in osu to lock orientation during gameplay, thus improving the gaming experience on iOS devices.
